about_the_game:
Expansion pack for "Nightshade".
Download to enjoy new episodes with each romanceable character.
Five short stories in a bundle.
(Fully voiced, new illustrations and free wallpaper included.)

A short episode with Gekkamaru (CV: Wataru Hatano).
Gekkamaru seems to have lost something. Help him out in his search.
New graphics exclusive to the expansion!

A short episode with Kuroyuki (CV: Hiro Shimono).
Kuroyuki is at it again! What does it mean to be ""lover-like""?
New graphics exclusive to the expansion!

A short episode with Chōjirō Momochi (CV: Kohsuke Toriumi).
A personal mission to repay Brother Chojiro for his kindness.
New graphics exclusive to the expansion!

A short episode with Hanzō Hattori. (CV: Kenjiro Tsuda).
Take a walk with Hanzo - it's the day off for the both of you.
New graphics exclusive to the expansion!

A short episode with Goemon Ishikawa (CV: Hikaru Midorikawa).
A broken hair tie, Miss? It's time to go shopping with Goemon!
New graphics exclusive to the expansion!

Notice-
Additional CGs are not showing in Gallery ,because of specifications.
